about_the_game:
Halloween is a great time to run a spooky campaign. Be prepared for Halloween with this full album release! Intense, Exciting and Dramatic are some great ways to describe this Music Pack.

  • 20 New Full Length Songs are Included
  • All songs can have their Tempo changed making nearly unlimited variations!

Tracks

  • Evil Musicbox
  • Night Has Come
  • Morning Mist
  • They are Coming
  • Corpse Ballet
  • Thorn Forest
  • Candy Factory
  • The Flying Things
  • The Quiet
  • Haunted Castle
  • Witching Hour
  • Howling Wind
  • Can't See me
  • Tricky Treaty
  • Parade
  • Phantom Palace
  • Insides Out
  • Pumpkin Commander
  • Blood Pumpkin
  • Sweet Nightmare

Enough reading about it, the video contains (15 second) clips from each song in this pack.

Halloween is a great time to run a spooky campaign. Be prepared for Halloween with this full album release! Intense, Exciting and Dramatic are some great ways to describe this Music Pack.

name: Ambient DM DLC - (Music) Halloween

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Phenom II x4
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Phenom II x4
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Device
